channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Service Framework application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Service Framework application

item.title: CVE-2017-3759|2024-09-16T19:19:06.707Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- service%20framework%20application
item.description: The Lenovo Service Framework Android application accepts some responses from the server without proper validation. This exposes the application to man-in-the-middle attacks leading to possible remote code execution.
